content.raw:
OK, that is very helpful.  I guess I messed something up with the update today.  I updated from source instead of with apt-get install.
I just now reinstalled the urdf using the code from Steve, but am getting the same behavior, so I suspect that my setup is using a different urdf than the one I updated and thought it was using.  At one point I had this all working :/

I'll do a careful combing to hunt down the urdf that the sim is using.
content.html:
OK, that is very helpful. I guess I messed something up with the update today. I updated from source instead of with apt-get install. I just now reinstalled the urdf using the code from Steve, but am getting the same behavior, so I suspect that my setup is using a different urdf than the one I updated and thought it was using. At one point I had this all working :/

I'll do a careful combing to hunt down the urdf that the sim is using.
